entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Grande Prairie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:03 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Cloudy, -30.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Grande Prairie Airport 08:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Cloudy
Temperature: -30.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 103.1 kPa falling
Visibility: 40.2 km
Humidity: 71 %
Wind Chill: -35
Dewpoint: -33.8°C

Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Friday: Light snow. High minus 28.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 28. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 33 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 27.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 27. Wind chill near minus 34. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Friday 23 December 2022
